definition: to send/to devote/to deliver/to cause/to convey

sentences.english: Say, read the book you see smoke on the fetal well, easy to teratogenicity .
sentences.chinese: 就說你看到書上寫着抽菸對胎兒不好，容易致畸。

sentences.english: In order to study teratogenic effects of Opuntia milpa alta flower on embryos of SD rats.
sentences.chinese: 爲了瞭解仙人掌粉對SD大鼠胚胎致畸作用的影響。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate toxicity and teratogenic effect of Microula seed oil on embryo of rat.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討微孔草子油對大鼠胚胎毒性和致畸作用。

sentences.english: Objective To study the teratogenicity and subacute toxicity of chlorine dioxide for its safety assessment.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究二氧化氯消毒液的致畸性和亞急性毒性。

sentences.english: Several chemicals are well known teratogens.
sentences.chinese: 有一些化合物已知是致畸物質。

sentences.english: Conclusion The methylmercury likely has the effect on behavioral teratogenesis of rats.
sentences.chinese: 結論氯化甲基汞具有行爲致畸作用。

sentences.english: No data have been published on first trimester teratogenic risk with ondansetron.
sentences.chinese: 沒有研究表明在妊娠早期使用恩丹西酮有致畸風險。

sentences.english: Thus, copper acetic acid had systematical teratogenic effects on Vicia faba root tip cells.
sentences.chinese: 因此，乙酸銅對蠶豆根尖細胞具有明顯的致畸效應。

sentences.english: There is no evidence that doxylamineis a teratogen.
sentences.chinese: 目前沒有證據證明抗敏安能夠致畸。

sentences.english: OBJECTIVE To explore the toxicological effects of Slug capsule on teratogenicity and mutagenicity.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討蛞蝓膠囊是否具有致畸和致突變的毒理作用。

sentences.english: OBJECTIVE To detect toxicity of Changqing Capsule in rats during teratogenic sensitive period.
sentences.chinese: 目的觀察常青膠囊對大鼠致畸敏感期的毒性。

sentences.english: Cloning would join the u afe drug Thalidomide in the teratogenic hall of infamy.
sentences.chinese: 克隆將作爲致畸高手，與不安全藥物“反應停”一樣。

definition: glucocorticosteroid (corticosteroid hormone secreted by the adrenal cortex)
